item.title: All Chapels for All Women
Meta Moments
item.description: ‚ùñ This image was a gift to my friend Bez. Thank you Bez. Occasionally I’ll join an “art trade” to change things up and break the repetition of working in one universe with one set of characters. Bez is a friend of mine and a talented artist, and so for Christmas we decided to produce secret works involving characters and places we don’t usually draw. There’s nothing more exciting as an artist than seeing through new eyes – that’s the magic of having someone illustrate your people and places.
